definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: The siphons emptied lead to deadlocks in the system.
sentences.chinese: 系統中被清空的信標導致死鎖發生。

sentences.english: You who are on the path of Light are beacons that shine out into the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 誰是你的道路上的信標光照耀到的黑暗。

sentences.english: Only one target can be the Beacon of Light at a time.
sentences.chinese: 在同一時間內，只有一個目標可以被標記爲聖光信標。

sentences.english: The test set is used in conjunction with TACAN Beacon Simulators.
sentences.chinese: 該測試設備用於與塔康信標模擬器連接。

sentences.english: The beacon beckoned to the pilot, the beam pointed to the target .
sentences.chinese: 定向信標指揮駕駛員，射束則指向目標。

sentences.english: Beacon must be placed in the designated LZ.
sentences.chinese: 信標必須安置在指定的着陸點。

sentences.english: The Airstrike ability will set down a beacon that will call in an airstrike when activated.
sentences.chinese: 空襲將設下一個信標並在激活態下召喚空襲。

sentences.english: The deadlock prevention approach is a deadlock control based on siphons.
sentences.chinese: 死鎖預防是基於信標的一種死鎖控制方法。

sentences.english: The protocol defines beaconing devices and passive devices.
sentences.chinese: 在該協議中定義信標設備和無源設備。

sentences.english: You know, it's got all the yellow warning beacons and a lot of steam and everything.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，這一切黃色預警信標和大量的蒸氣和一切。

sentences.english: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering.
sentences.chinese: 信標學院淪陷已經數月了，而樹不子世界還在重建中。
